title: A bullied N.J. student died by suicide. Now, the superintendent has resigned
description: Adriana Kuch, a freshman in the Central Regional School District along the Jersey Shore, died on Feb. 3. Her father says bullying led her to take her own life.

title: Biden fires the Architect of the Capitol after bipartisan criticism from lawmakers
description: An inspector general investigation found that J. Brett Blanton had misused government vehicles and "impersonated a government agent," among other ethical violations.

title: They can shoot down the UFOs, but they can't shoot down our hopes of meeting aliens
description: We've been seeing a lot of unexplained UFOs lately. Now the White House has stepped in to set the record straight.

title: UFOs? Airborne objects? What we know about 4 recent shootdowns
description: The shootdowns came in steady succession over the weekend, after alarms were raised in early February over an object spotted over Montana.

title: Videos show Turkey's Erdogan boasted letting builders avoid earthquake codes
description: Videos have surfaced in Turkish media of the president in 2019 praising a policy that let builders off the hook for skirting safety codes that could have made buildings more quake resistant.

title: A judge blocks the release of most of a grand jury report in Georgia election probe
description: For now, the final recommendations of a special grand jury investigating attempts to overturn Georgia's 2020 presidential election will largely be kept under wraps, a judge ruled.

title: The U.S. is urging Americans to leave Russia 'immediately' due to security risks
description: The embassy in Moscow warned of the "unpredictable consequences" of the war in Ukraine, and said dual U.S.-Russian citizens in particular risked being forcibly conscripted into Russia's armed forces.

title: 'Dr. Lisa on the street' busts health myths and empowers patients
description: She's seen what happens when people don't trust or understand their doctor. Dr. Lisa Fitzpatrick founded 'Grapevine Health' to get solid information out, especially to Black and Latinx patients.

title: Latest in Ukraine: Updates on Russia's war and a look ahead (Feb. 13)
description: Catch up on key developments and the latest in-depth coverage of Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

title: Haley signals a new direction for the GOP's national ticket
description: Vice President Kamala Harris' ascent to her current position represents a long step toward making women's full political equality a reality in both parties.

title: China accuses U.S. of flying spy balloons into Chinese airspace more than 10 times
description: The accusations made by China on Monday have further ratcheted up tensions between the two countries amid mutual allegations of surveillance.

title: 'Hijab Butch Blues' challenges stereotypes and upholds activist self-care
description: Lamya H's memoir is a study guide on Islam and a queer manifesto that follows them from a childhood a move to the U.S. through questions of faith, gender and sexuality.

title: 3 men in 3 days fell through the ice over a lake in Vermont
description: The three men were all ice fishermen, and two of the men were brothers.

title: Reporter's dismissal exposes political pressures on West Virginia Public Broadcasting
description: A reporter was dismissed after state officials complained — the latest instance of political pressure on the station from Gov. Jim Justice's administration and some state legislators.

title: Adidas is looking to repurpose unsold Yeezy products. Here are some of its options
description: Retail experts say Yeezys will be particularly difficult to resell given their distinct design and damaged reputation. But not doing so could cost Adidas up to 500 million euros.

title: If there's a war against climate change, Saint-Louis is on the front line. And losing
description: The UNESCO World Heritage city of Saint-Louis is perched precariously between the Atlantic Ocean and the Senegal River. And it's on borrowed time.

title: Super Bowl commercials, from Adam Driver(s) to M&M candies; the hits and the misses
description: Advertisers spent up to $7 million for every 30 seconds of airtime during Super Bowl LVII. Here's a sampling of what worked – and didn't – in the most expensive ad showcase on American television.

title: Rescuers keep digging for survivors a week after the Turkey-Syria earthquake
description: People buried under rubble in southern Turkey continue to defy the odds, surviving freezing weather and a week without water. A 40-year-old woman was pulled alive in Gaziantep province early Monday.

title: Mars Wrigley fined after workers fall into vat of chocolate
description: Federal workplace safety authorities have fined a central Pennsylvania confectionary factory more than $14,500 following an accident last year in which two workers fell into a vat of chocolate.

title: The Philippines accuses a Chinese ship of aiming a laser at a Filipino boat crew
description: The Philippines has accused a Chinese coast guard ship of hitting a Philippine coast guard vessel with a military-grade laser and temporarily blinding some of its crew in the disputed South China Sea.

title: Kansas City is super again: Chiefs beat Philadelphia Eagles 38-35 in 2023 Super Bowl
description: Chiefs quarterback and NFL MVP Patrick Mahomes led the Chiefs to their third Super Bowl victory (and second in three years). It's the first time the reigning MVP has won a Super Bowl since 1999.
